text: Novonikolayevka () is a rural locality (a village) in Nizhneulu-Yelginsky Selsoviet, Yermekeyevsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 74 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 3 km from Yermekeyevo, 1 km from Nizhneulu-Yelga. == References == Category:Rural localities in Yermekeyevsky District
title: Novonikolayevka, Yermekeyevsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
